name: plasma-applet-resources-monitor
description: Plasmoid for monitoring CPU, memory and network traffic. This is an fork from "Resources Monitor" by Kotelnik
author: orblazer

scripts.version: npm run version:bump && npm run version:changelog
scripts.version:changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run pack
